headline: Kroger (KR): Revisiting Its Valuation After Sustained Shareholder Returns and Digital Growth
summary: Kroger (KR) shares have seen some movement recently, and investors may be interested in how the stock has performed over the past month and beyond. With steady gains year to date, the supermarket chain continues to attract attention. See our latest analysis for Kroger. Kroger’s share price momentum has held up over the long run, with a 1-year total shareholder return of 21% and a notable 3-year TSR of nearly 65%. While recent price changes have been moderate, the stock’s steady overall...

headline: Kroger Voluntarily Recalls Two Varieties of Deli Pasta Salads Because of Possible Health Risk
summary: The Kroger Co. (NYSE: KR), said today it has recalled Basil Pesto Bowtie Salad and Smoked Mozzarella Penne Salad that was sold in the Kroger Family of Stores in following states: AK, AL, AR, AZ, CA, CO, GA, ID, IL, IN, KS, KY, LA, MI, MO, MS, MT, NE, NM, NV, OH, OR, SC, TN, TX, UT, WA and WV. This follows a recall initiated by Fresh Creative Foods, due to possible Listeria monocytogenes contamination of the pasta ingredient that was manufactured by Nate's Fine Foods of Roseville, CA.
